Text: Great upload mate, great albums from a brilliant band.
Should make it clear in the description these cannot be converted for iPod.

It is clear, to people who understand codecs.  

I would advise not using a limited and proprietary music player like iTunes.  Apple specifically left out support for open formats because they don't jive with their corporate desire to control what you do with your device and sell you inferior lossy music that they get a 30% cut from.
